frontmatter.title: Universal rendering with preact
frontmatter.description: In this article I explain a technique and conventions to follow in order to achieve Universal rendering (the ability to render an app both client and server side) using preact, node and redux.

frontmatter.title: Exploring new techniques on building composable widgets for the web
frontmatter.description: During my first days at the Coral Project I experimented with a feature intimately related with the collaborative nature of the Cral initiative. The main idea is to build a tool to create embeddable widgets to embed into media sites giving more insights to the users about their contributions as well as other readers.

frontmatter.title: Express (and Components) Presentation at node.js Argentina Meetup
frontmatter.description: I had the pleasure to be invited to talk at the 2nd node.js Argentina meetup about ExpressJS. Because most of the attendees are starting with node the main idea was to introduce some important aspects about this llibrary and the motivations about express.

frontmatter.title: Tuiter 0.1.1
frontmatter.description: I've been working on Tuiter. This new release count with two major features: **Automatic Reconnection** and **Gzip compression**.
